alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:55PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sumner County through 330 PM CDT... At 254 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wellington. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Mulvane, Belle Plaine, Oxford, Mayfield, Riverdale and Wellington Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 16 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
